Author: daeboo
Text: I'm seconding this, you can even put soup or broth in a thermos/mug and sip on it. The sodium in broth helps with electrolytes as well.

Author: liquid_nitrogenn
Text: When I was too anxious to eat in front of others back in high school, I would bring a protein shake or smoothie in a S'Well bottle (or really any opaque water bottle). To other people it looks like you're just hydrating, and it doesn't draw any attention to you.
